title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending multiple lines to a StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is being redrawn for each line, resulting in inefficient performance.
OB: Appending N lines to a StyledText in word wrap mode causes N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: Appending N lines to a StyledText in word wrap mode should only result in a single redraw of the modified portion of the client area, improving performance.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Create a StyledText widget in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.
3. Observe the multiple redraws of the entire client area.

To verify the fix, add the following line to the performPaint method of StyledText:
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight); Then perform the above steps again and ensure that only a single redraw of the modified portion of the client area occurs.
